note.p: Burial Place: Temple Church, London, England, Europe (20 July 1675)
Memberships: Honorary Fellow of the College of Physicians (1664)
Committee appointments include: Committee for Correspondence (1664)
Committee for causing a catalogue to be made of the Arundel Library (1667)
Other RSActivity: Acted as a correspondent abroad for possible zoological matters (1664)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB (source for dates of birth and death); ODNB

Notes: The election date is Ball's election date into the Society after the grant of the second charter in April 1663. All Fellows admitted in a two-month window after this charter, until 22 June 1663, are considered Original Fellows.
